Silvally (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0772: Type: Null
Pokémon
#0774: Minior →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Silvally (TCG Pocket).

Silvally has been featured on 4 different cards since it debuted in the Crimson Invasion expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Silvally cards are normally Colorless-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Silvally

Silvally
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Silvally         SM-P Promotional cards   121/SM-P
SM Black Star Promos   SM64 Solgaleo-GX & Lunala-GX Legendary Starter Set   010/021
Silvally Unified Minds 184/236 Sky Legend 043/054
Silvally
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Silvally Crimson Invasion 90/111 Awakened Heroes 045/050
Crimson Invasion 108/111 Awakened Heroes 054/050
Crimson Invasion 119/111 Awakened Heroes 059/050
SM Black Star Promos   SM91 SM-P Promotional cards   122/SM-P
Ultra Prism 116/156 GX Battle Boost 086/114
        GX Ultra Shiny 111/150
Hidden Fates SV79/SV94 GX Ultra Shiny 242/150
Silvally Cosmic Eclipse 184/236 Dream League 041/049
Cosmic Eclipse 227/236 Dream League 065/049
Cosmic Eclipse 262/236 Dream League 072/049
